definition: grade/class number (in school)/flight or run number/flight or run (seen as an item)/shift (work period)
next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time

sentences.english: To perform shift and work overtime when necessary.
sentences.chinese: 開展本班次工作和必要時延時工作。

sentences.english: Ensuring the shift is reviewed and hand-over and briefings are carried out.
sentences.chinese: 確保每個班次的回顧交接班及例會的召開。

sentences.english: A:I'm on flight 724 to Taibei on September 3,Saturday.
There are more sailings from Huangpu instead of Shantou?
sentences.chinese: 黃蒲開船的班次比汕頭多。

sentences.english: These are the divisions of the porters among the sons of Kore, and among the sons of Merari.
sentences.chinese: 以上是可拉子孫和米拉利子孫守門的班次。

sentences.english: These are the divisions of the porters among the sons of Kore， and among the sons of Merari.
sentences.chinese: 以上是可拉子孫和米拉利子孫守門的班次。

sentences.english: We have no non-stop flights to California.
sentences.chinese: 我們沒有直飛加州的班次。

sentences.english: The MRT in Taipei is really convenient. It comes very frequently during peak hours.
sentences.chinese: 臺北的捷運真是方便，尖峯時段班次很密集。

sentences.english: Japan Air Lines Flight No.32 has been delayed three hours.
sentences.chinese: 日本航空公司三十二班次的飛機已經晚點三小時。

sentences.english: Nine flights were made in all, carrying in money and 2400 lbs. of supplies.
sentences.chinese: 九班次航空運輸，攜帶現金和2400磅用品。

sentences.english: Each dayâ ™s point represents the prime-shift view of that day.
sentences.chinese: 每天的點表示這一天的主要班次視圖。

sentences.english: Paris CDG has 56 departures per week to Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 巴黎戴高樂有56至巴西班次每週。

sentences.english: These are the divisions of the porters of the sons of Core, and of Merari.
sentences.chinese: 以上是科辣黑子孫和默辣黎子孫守門的班次。

sentences.english: I'd like two seats on today's Northwest Flight 7 to Detroit please.
sentences.chinese: 我想訂兩張今毯枉北航空公司7班次到底特律的機票。

sentences.english: And David divided them into courses among the sons of Levi， namely， Gershon， Kohath， and Merari.
sentences.chinese: 大衛將利未人革順，哥轄，米拉利的子孫分了班次。

sentences.english: I’d like two seats on today’s Northwest Flight 7 to Detroit, please.
sentences.chinese: 我想訂兩張今天西北航空公司7班次到底特律的機票。

definition: train or coach service ("service" as in "they run 12 services per day between the two cities")
departure (of a coach or train)/to dispatch a vehicle
scheduled flight/flight number/plane/scheduled sailing/sailing number/passenger ship
bus or tram stop/intermediate stop (on route of ship, plane etc)/port of call/stopover
shuttle bus (or train)/train or bus traveling only part of its normal route
special-purpose phone line or communications link/hotline/special rail line (e.g. between airport and city)/CL:條|条[tiao2]
